home.title: Book Trash
home.subtitle: Transform your learning with AI-powered insights
home.description: Upload documents, ask questions, and get intelligent responses to enhance your learning experience.
home.heroTitle: Transform Any Documentation into Interactive Learning
home.heroDescription: Enter a technology documentation URL and let AI create a personalized learning path just for you.

features.uploadDesc: Support multiple file formats for learning materials
features.chatDesc: Interactive conversations with AI about your content
features.quizDesc: Generate quizzes based on your learning materials
features.aiDesc: Advanced AI extracts key concepts and creates structured learning paths
features.interactiveDesc: Engage with quizzes, Q&A sessions, and step-by-step guidance
features.instantDesc: Get immediate insights and start learning within seconds

dashboard.title: Learning Session

dashboard.noSessionDesc: Start a new learning session to see your personalized content here.

chat.suggestion3: Can you explain the key features?
